item.title: To-Do List App - Part-1
item.description: Creating a Todo List Command Line Application in Python Prerequisites : Make sure you have Python installed on your system. In this tutorial, we will create a simple command-line Todo List application using Python. The application allows users to add tasks, list tasks, remove tasks, add labels to tasks, and clear all tasks. The tasks are stored in a text file for persistence. It supports the following commands:
